page.title: 15YOXALL_SCHOOL TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: St.Peter's Primary School is on a bend;we have a crash barrier to prevent vehicles mounting the pavement On Sept.9th,class 6 took a traffic census and were surprised to find so much.There were 1139 cars and 456 other vehicles,42 bicycles,335 pedestrians all between 9am and 3.30pm Bicycles carefully wove their way around the dangerous corner as large lorries zoomed past.Lorries dashed in a racing competition around the bend, grinding to a halt when other lorries raced near.Other lorries stopped with trouble and tried to negociate the kerb.Bicycles clicked gently passed. Motor bikes acccelerated around the corner leaning to the side recklessly. I hope one day my thoughts will be read and perhaps there will be a by- pass which has been needed for 40 years. Jane Wright,Tim Bernard age 11
